description: sheet is irregularly curved at top--roughly half-circle shape; Jesus standing at center, holding his hand out to Lazarus at right, who holds his PR arm out toward Jesus and is being assisted out of the tomb by a bearded man; kneeling woman attended by standing woman to left of Jesus; dog in foreground, LLQ; other figures in middle ground, right of center, and at left; shades of grey; squared off in pencil
dimension:
8 3/8 x 16 1/8 in. (21.27 x 40.96 cm) (sheet, irregular)
14 3/4 x 21 7/8 in. (37.47 x 55.56 cm) (outer frame)
title: The Raising of Lazarus
